name: Yangtze
hint: Longest river in Asia, flows through central China to the East China Sea

name: Yellow River
hint: Second longest river in China, cradle of Chinese civilization

name: Ganges
hint: Sacred river of Hinduism flowing through northern India

name: Mekong
hint: Major Southeast Asian river flowing through six countries

name: Indus
hint: River that gave India its name, flows through Pakistan

name: Brahmaputra
hint: Major river originating in Tibet, flowing through India and Bangladesh

name: Tigris
hint: One of two great rivers of Mesopotamia, flows through Baghdad

name: Euphrates
hint: Longest river in western Asia, paired with the Tigris in ancient Mesopotamia

name: Ob
hint: Major Siberian river flowing north into the Arctic Ocean

name: Irrawaddy
hint: Most important river of Myanmar, flowing south through the country's heartland

name: Lena
hint: One of the longest rivers in the world, flowing through eastern Siberia to the Arctic

name: Yenisei
hint: Largest river flowing into the Arctic Ocean, runs through central Siberia

name: Amur
hint: Major river forming the border between Russia and China in the Far East

name: Salween
hint: One of the longest free-flowing rivers in Southeast Asia, from Tibet to Myanmar

name: Jordan River
hint: Biblically significant river flowing into the Dead Sea, a holy baptism site

name: Amu Darya
hint: Major Central Asian river, the ancient Oxus, flowing into the Aral Sea basin

name: Syr Darya
hint: Central Asian river known in antiquity as the Jaxartes, flows through Kazakhstan

name: Pearl River
hint: Third-longest river in China, flowing through Guangzhou to the South China Sea

name: Chao Phraya
hint: Major river of Thailand flowing through Bangkok to the Gulf of Thailand

name: Godavari
hint: Second-longest river in India, often called the Ganges of the South
